cuisineType: Cuisine from the Aosta Valley, Classic Cuisine
description: A pleasant family trattoria which has been in business since 1966, this restaurant serves simple and authentic cuisine which showcases the products of the Aosta Valley, as well as excellent meat, most of which comes from outside Italy. In addition to the first-floor dining room, there’s also a historic taverna, while four welcoming guestrooms are available for anyone wishing to extend their stay.
